21 #include "concurrent_monitor.h"

23 namespace tbb {
24 namespace internal {
25 
26 void concurrent_monitor::thread_context::init() {
27  new (sema.begin()) binary_semaphore;
28  ready = true;
29 }
30 
31 concurrent_monitor::~concurrent_monitor() {
32  abort_all();
33  __TBB_ASSERT( waitset_ec.empty(), "waitset not empty?" );
34 }
35 
36 void concurrent_monitor::prepare_wait( thread_context& thr, uintptr_t ctx ) {
37  if( !thr.ready )
38  thr.init();
39  // this is good place to pump previous skipped wakeup
40  else if( thr.skipped_wakeup ) {
41  thr.skipped_wakeup = false;
42  thr.semaphore().P();
43  }
44  thr.context = ctx;
45  thr.in_waitset = true;
46  {
47  tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock l( mutex_ec );
48  __TBB_store_relaxed( thr.epoch, __TBB_load_relaxed(epoch) );
49  waitset_ec.add( (waitset_t::node_t*)&thr );
50  }
51  atomic_fence();
52 }
53 
54 void concurrent_monitor::cancel_wait( thread_context& thr ) {
55  // possible skipped wakeup will be pumped in the following prepare_wait()
56  thr.skipped_wakeup = true;
57  // try to remove node from waitset
58  bool th_in_waitset = thr.in_waitset;
59  if( th_in_waitset ) {
60  tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock l( mutex_ec );
61  if (thr.in_waitset) {
62  waitset_ec.remove( (waitset_t::node_t&)thr );
63  // node is removed from waitset, so there will be no wakeup
64  thr.in_waitset = false;
65  thr.skipped_wakeup = false;
66  }
67  }
68 }
69 
70 void concurrent_monitor::notify_one_relaxed() {
71  if( waitset_ec.empty() )
72  return;
73  waitset_node_t* n;
74  const waitset_node_t* end = waitset_ec.end();
75  {
76  tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock l( mutex_ec );
77  __TBB_store_relaxed( epoch, __TBB_load_relaxed(epoch) + 1 );
78  n = waitset_ec.front();
79  if( n!=end ) {
80  waitset_ec.remove( *n );
81  to_thread_context(n)->in_waitset = false;
82  }
83  }
84  if( n!=end )
85  to_thread_context(n)->semaphore().V();
86 }
87 
88 void concurrent_monitor::notify_all_relaxed() {
89  if( waitset_ec.empty() )
90  return;
91  waitset_t temp;
92  const waitset_node_t* end;
93  {
94  tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock l( mutex_ec );
95  __TBB_store_relaxed( epoch, __TBB_load_relaxed(epoch) + 1 );
96  waitset_ec.flush_to( temp );
97  end = temp.end();
98  for( waitset_node_t* n=temp.front(); n!=end; n=n->next )
99  to_thread_context(n)->in_waitset = false;
100  }
101  waitset_node_t* nxt;
102  for( waitset_node_t* n=temp.front(); n!=end; n=nxt ) {
103  nxt = n->next;
104  to_thread_context(n)->semaphore().V();
105  }
106 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
107  temp.clear();
108 #endif
109 }
110 
111 void concurrent_monitor::abort_all_relaxed() {
112  if( waitset_ec.empty() )
113  return;
114  waitset_t temp;
115  const waitset_node_t* end;
116  {
117  tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock l( mutex_ec );
118  __TBB_store_relaxed( epoch, __TBB_load_relaxed(epoch) + 1 );
119  waitset_ec.flush_to( temp );
120  end = temp.end();
121  for( waitset_node_t* n=temp.front(); n!=end; n=n->next )
122  to_thread_context(n)->in_waitset = false;
123  }
124  waitset_node_t* nxt;
125  for( waitset_node_t* n=temp.front(); n!=end; n=nxt ) {
126  nxt = n->next;
127  to_thread_context(n)->aborted = true;
128  to_thread_context(n)->semaphore().V();
129  }
130 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
131  temp.clear();
132 #endif
133 }
134 
135 } // namespace internal
136 } // namespace tbb
